Clip.Title: THE PREDATOR COAST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On southern coast of Africa all must bow to the power of the coastal plain's seasons: a ruthless cycle that has the power to give life and take it away.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANT KING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Mayhem is about to break out in Namibia's Etosha National Park. This sprawling, arid land plays host to the highest concentration of elephants on Earth, and they've recently lost their leader. The quest to become the new elephant king is on, and the candidates are all six-ton giants, willing to throw their weight around.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.

Clip.Title: THE PREDATOR COAST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On southern coast of Africa all must bow to the power of the coastal plain's seasons: a ruthless cycle that has the power to give life and take it away.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANT KING

This sprawling, arid land plays host to the highest concentration of elephants on Earth, and they've recently lost their leader. The quest to become the new elephant king is on, and the candidates are all six-ton giants, willing to throw their weight around.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Namibian Villagers are forced to abandon their lands as neighbouring Rivers swell and swallow up entire settlements.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Canada's easternmost point to Europe's westernmost point, this aerial survey explores the Atlantic coastline, from the wonders of St. John's Newfoundland and the Avalon peninsula - to the unique islands of St. Pierre and Miquelon.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SPACE VOYAGES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: NASA is sizing up a new but familiar challenge: how to transport humans back into deep space - to the moon, to Mars, to asteroids, and beyond. New destinations require new hardware - more powerful rockets and radical new landing modules. Venture back to our early space adventures with Buzz Aldrin, Jim Lovell and NASA experts and learn about the successes and failures of the Apollo missions. Follow today's technicians as they reach for the stars by learning from these lessons of the past.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Northwest from the ferry terminal at British Columbia's Horseshoe Bay, the Sunshine Coast is an incredible journey - featuring world famous mountain ranges, forest landscapes - and iconic towns and settlements

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: British Columbia's Coastal Adventures truly begin where the road ends - north of Powell River - as we explore offshore islands, inland volcanoes, and forgotten World War II defense fortifications.

Clip.Title: THE BLOOD OF THE ROSE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Learn about the life and death of Joan Root, a wildlife filmmaker turned conservationist who was murdered while trying to save Lake Naivasha, the only fresh water lake in Kenya and the centre of the cut flower industry, Kenya's second largest export.

Clip.Title: THE ICEBERG PROJECT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Engineer Georges Mougin will try a revolutionary approach to bringing water to arid regions in need by towing an iceberg from the coast of Canada across the Atlantic before it melts. Towing and utilizing icebergs for freshwater: could the dream become reality?

Clip.Title: SOLA: LOUISIANA WATER STORIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A look at how the gusher in the Gulf which was the worst man made ecological disaster ever and how it was allowed to happen. Was environmental pollution simply a cost of doing business?

Clip.Title: THE BLOOD OF THE ROSE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Learn about the life and death of Joan Root, a wildlife filmmaker turned conservationist who was murdered while trying to save Lake Naivasha, the only fresh water lake in Kenya and the centre of the cut flower industry, Kenya's second largest export.
